sentences.cn: …一位正在计算地球周长的科学家。

sentences.en: Cut the salmon into long strips and wrap it round the circumference of the bread.
sentences.cn: 把鲑鱼切成长条，缠裹在面包上。

sentences.en: In each case an integral number of wavelengths fit into the circumference of the loop.
sentences.cn: 在各种情形下,环的周长都等于波长的整数倍.

sentences.en: It's a mile round the circumference of the field.
The compressor - outlet pressure is nearly constant around the circumference.
sentences.cn: 压气机出口压力沿圆周方向接近于常数.

sentences.en: The diameter and the circumference of a circle correlate.
sentences.cn: 圆的直径与圆周有相互关系.

sentences.en: The earth's circumference is about 25,000 miles.
The earth's circumference is nearly 25,000 miles.
The given radius being 4 ft., find the circumference.
sentences.cn: 已知半径为四英尺, 求周长.

sentences.en: The island is 3.5 km in circumference.
The lake has a circumference of 800 li.
The lake is thirty li in circumference.
The lake is twenty miles in circumference.
The tree has a circumference of 6 feet.
This tree has a circumference of 6 feet.

trans.tran_en: the distance or measurement around the outside of a circle or any round shape
